scripts.install:all: pnpm install && pnpm --filter ./client install && pnpm --filter ./server install
scripts.clean:all: rm -rf node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf client/node_modules client/pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf server/node_modules server/pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.refresh:all: pnpm run clean:all && pnpm run install:all
scripts.dev: concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER -c cyan,green "pnpm --filter client dev" "pnpm --filter server dev"
